title: description
Beyonce & Jay-Z's Crazy In Love: A crazy mix between the Five-fifteen and the Zorba. As crazy as Beyonce & Jay-Z's figure.

title: notes
Beyonce & Jay-Z's Crazy In Love: Curacao, Dry Vermouth and a hint of pocket.

title: pairing
Beyonce & Jay-Z's Crazy In Love: Beyonce & Jay-Z have it with a r Coffee ice cream and toaster strudel.

title: serving_suggestion
Beyonce & Jay-Z's Crazy In Love: Stir with ice and strain. Drink to the r sounds of Crazy In Love.
